dataList.title: Drifting Fox
dataList.prevDesc: Esses guarda -chuvas irregulares poderiam proteger essa raposa, realmente?
dataList.eventDesc:
Os velhos guarda -chuvas estão alinhados ao redor da raposa à deriva.

Guarda -chuvas velhos, desgastados e escondidos.

Os guarda -chuvas parecem que estão ali, pois asas sabem quanto tempo tentando proteger a raposa, mas certamente não parece que eles estão fazendo um bom trabalho nisso.

"……."

Então, um pecador caminhou lentamente em sua direção.

A raposa percebeu o pecador se aproximando, mas não rosna, nem relaxa alegremente.

Ele permanece imóvel, mantendo seu lugar sempre constante.
successDesc:
[{0}] walked toward the fox before getting under a worn umbrella.

Despite being an umbrella, it allowed numerous drops of rain to fall through it.

Chilling winds and damp air brush against the Sinner under the umbrella.

"……."

But [{0}] raised their head up to see the sky, making a profound smile.

As if the Sinner knew the rain will stop someday.
failureDesc:
[{0}] walked toward the fox before getting under a worn umbrella.

Despite being an umbrella, it allowed numerous drops of rain to fall through it.

Chilling winds and damp air brush against the Sinner under the umbrella.

"…Haah."

[{0}] drooped down with a large sigh.

It may not be easy to notice from afar,

but it must have been the cumulation of gloom and dampening the person under the umbrella felt.

dataList.title: Centopéia de choque
dataList.prevDesc: A centopéia se contorce como se estivesse enrolando.
dataList.eventDesc:
O corpo de Centipede de choque está começando a se enrolar em um local.
"Parece que a eletricidade está se reunindo."
Como o pecador apontou, as faíscas estão voando do centro de seu corpo enrolado.
Pode ser uma boa ideia impedir isso.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem será capaz de impedir isso?
successDesc:
[{0}] struck at the Shock Centipede's carapace.

"Ohh...!"

A crack opened up in its hard-looking armor.

Could it really have stopped the centipede?

This ought to be a rare opportunity.
failureDesc:
[{0}] struck at the Shock Centipede's carapace.

Alas...

Could the stored power have sprung forth?

Tremendous showers of sparks popped out of the Centipede's center along with a thunderous boom.

Naturally, [{0}] was knocked away by the shockwave.

Fortunately enough, it only pushed the Sinner away and did little harm...

But the Centipede looks quite angry.

It'd be a good idea to brace up, right?

dataList.title: Cavalheiro de fada
dataList.prevDesc: Um cheiro intoxicante preenche o ar, quase pode deixá -lo bêbado.
dataList.eventDesc:
O cavalheiro de fadas falou com uma risada alegre.

"Huhu ... não achava que isso seria engolido."

Um pequeno soluço também pode ser ouvido.

"Eu admito, isso me pegou desprevenido um pouquinho ... apenas um pouquinho."

A fada então coloca o copo na mão na boca.

"Ei! Essa coisa está tentando ficar sóbria?"

"Devemos manter o Blackguard desorientado!"

… Parece que a fada deve ser impedida de beber da xícara.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem vai tirar o copo do cavalheiro?
successDesc:
[{0}] stood before the gentleman's mountainous belly.

"Ah, I couldn't share this with you, even if you're a privileged guest."

Instead of demanding it, [{0}] just stares into the fairy.

"...Ahem."

Completely still, not moving a muscle.

"...A-Alright, alright! I can give you... a little bit."

[{0}] shook their head.

"Are you... telling me to give you all of it?"

The Sinner nodded.

"You..."

"Fuu, haha. Fine, I've lost. You can have this."

[{0}] finally made a light smile as they claimed the cup.
failureDesc:
[{0}] stood before the gentleman's mountainous belly.

"Ah, I couldn't share this with you, even if you're a privileged guest."

Instead of demanding it, [{0}] just stares into the fairy.

"...Ahem."

Completely still, not moving a muscle.

"...Standing like that won't change my answer, you know?"

After vigorous laughter, the fairy gulped down all of the cup's content into his stomach.

"As much as I care about you, I couldn't give you everything I have, could I? Haha."

Defeated, [{0}] returned.

dataList.title: Para que ninguém irá chorar
dataList.prevDesc:
A boneca de madeira amaldiçoada parou de se mover.
O que poderia estar acontecendo?
dataList.eventDesc:
A boneca de madeira parou no lugar como se nada estivesse acontecendo.

Sua cabeça estava inclinada ligeiramente para baixo, como se estivesse examinando seus talismãs ...

Ou talvez pudesse estar olhando para os talismãs dos pecadores.

"……."

Como se possuísse, os pecadores começaram a caminhar em direção à boneca de madeira.

Era como se eles esquentassem que estavam brigando apenas momentos atrás.

E eles começaram a remover os talismãs enredados em seus corpos.

O que poderia estar acontecendo?
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem reunirá os talismãs e os devolverá?
successDesc:
[{0}] gathered the detached talismans and stood before the wooden doll.

It seems to be gazing silently.

Or, maybe it was just the Sinner's conscience making it seem that way.

The eagerness to return the talismans to where they were.

[{0}] extended their arm to hand over the stack of talismans...

As if drawn by a magnet, the talismans flew toward the doll.

"So that no one will cry..."

After muttering the phrase, [{0}] came back to their position.
failureDesc:
[{0}] gathered the detached talismans and stood before the wooden doll.

"……."

It creaked a little, then stretched a hand at [{0}].

Thinking it's to retrieve the talismans, [{0}] handed over the stack,

"Ah!"

The wooden hand changed its trajectory and touched the Sinner's body.

At that moment, all the talismans on [{0}] began writhing before melting into sticky blood.

…That doesn't bode well, does it?

dataList.title: Pegadas de fada
dataList.prevDesc: O céu parece ter sido coberto novamente. Por que continua lançando essa sombra?
dataList.eventDesc:
A planta gigante que a fada fez crescer era tão grossa quanto alta.

Tinha suas vantagens.

Como se esconder atrás da coluna de um prédio, um pecador conseguiu escapar da visão da fada.

O pecador então atingiu cuidadosamente o caule.
successDesc:
Striking at the stem, [{0}] climbed up the plant, hand over foot over hand.

The Sinner climbed so high, the others and the fairy appeared as tiny dots.

The plant seemed endlessly tall, but it had its end.

At last, [{0}] climbed onto the massive leaf at the top.

Then the Sinner carefully walked up to the edge...

And poked a hole in the leaf, causing the pool of water to fall on the fairy's head.

The fairy is making quite a fuss, looking surprised.
failureDesc:
Striking at the stem, [{0}] climbed up the plant, hand over foot over hand.

The Sinner climbed so high, the others and the fairy appeared as tiny dots.

The plant seemed endlessly tall, but it had its end.

At last, [{0}] climbed onto the massive leaf at the top.

But perhaps the Sinner failed to consider the amount of water that ponded on the leaf...

As soon as [{0}] stepped on the leaf, they slipped and fell right to the ground.

...It might be fortunate that the Sinner didn't die.

dataList.title: FAELANTERN
dataList.prevDesc: A fada colorida da cerceta apareceu novamente na ponta do ramo.
dataList.eventDesc:
Atacar essa fada novamente revelará sua verdadeira forma.

Esta não é a sua primeira vez que enfrenta essa entidade. Não será tão difícil quanto a primeira vez.

Os pecadores parecem concordar.

A fada simplesmente estava sentada ali em quase completa quietude, interrompida apenas por suas asas intermitentemente vibratórias. Era como se a fada soubesse que você estava vindo.
successDesc:
[{0}] charged toward the fairy.

After a light leap into the air, the Sinner swung the weapon toward the fairy.

”!!!”

The fairy appeared to scream, but no sound came from its mouth.

Maybe it wasn’t screaming at all. Perhaps it was just the swaying of branches.

”The eyes are coming out…”

”Get outta there! Here we go again.”

Numerous eyes open one by one, gleaming from the shadows.

They oscillate as though they’ll jump out at us at any minute.

So… What now?
failureDesc:
[{0}] charged toward the fairy.

After lightly leaping into the air, the Sinner swung the weapon toward the fairy.

But…

”That thing can dodge…?!”

Of course, it wasn’t going to be that easy. Assuming that a bait would remain stationary is a complacent thought.

The fairy had also lightly flown up into the air and glared at the Sinner, who dared to attack it.

”G-get out of there! It’s starting to move again!”

[{0}] tried to get away, but its main body had already tightened around the Sinner's legs.

So… What now?

dataList.title: Passageiro rebelde
dataList.prevDesc: Está escondido em outra dimensão novamente?
dataList.eventDesc:
Se essa luta tiver sido algo para se passar, em breve surgirá de uma das fendas dimensionais.

Se pudermos intuir seu próximo ponto de emergência, talvez possamos causar um golpe fatal contra ele antes que ele emerge completamente da fenda dimensional.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem pode intuir seu próximo ponto de emergência?
successDesc:
Soon, the entity began crawling out of the dimensional rift that [{0}] selected.

"!"

Though it sensed the Sinner’s presence before it emerged,

It didn’t have enough time to act before [{0}] swung their weapon at it.

The entity hurriedly closed the dimensional rift as it fled back into its safety. That seems to have destabilized the dimensional rift.

Opportunity.
failureDesc:
Soon, the entity began to crawl out of the dimensional rift.

… From the rift opposite to the one that [{0}] had selected, unfortunately.

[{0}] quickly turned around, brandishing their weapon… but the entity was faster.

It goes without saying that a powerful attack soon struck the Sinner.

dataList.title: Máquina de transporte a vapor
dataList.prevDesc: A luz lava os sedimentos do passado.
dataList.eventDesc:
Os tubos de vácuo no centro do tronco da máquina de transporte a vapor estão brilhando.

Lentamente, ou rapidamente, os números exibidos nos tubos de vácuo diminuíram…

E seu chassi quebrado e enferrujado começou a se reconstruir.

A máquina de transporte a vapor retornou quando foi produzida pela primeira vez?

Deixando para trás tudo o que passou.

Quanto mais antiga a máquina fica, mais de si terá que reconstruir.

Talvez a máquina de transporte a vapor possa ser interrompida ... se alguém pudesse chegar em seus tubos de vácuo?
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem chegará aos tubos de vácuo?
successDesc:
[{0}] strode up to the Steam Transport Machine.

It appeared that the Steam Transport Machine was in a deep focus. The machine stood completely still, no matter how close the Sinner got to it.

[{0}] did not hesitate to reach into the vacuum tubes.

”Ooh!!”

”The numbers…!”

Looks like [{0}] tapped into their creativity and swapped out one of the electrodes connected to the vacuum tubes.

That seems to have done the trick; the numbers ceased to decrease.

The Steam Transport Machine began to creak into motion once again, as though it just realized what had happened, but the perpetrator was long gone.
failureDesc:
[{0}] strode up to the Steam Transport Machine.

It appeared that the Steam Transport Machine was in a deep focus. The machine stood completely still, no matter how close the Sinner got to it.

[{0}] did not hesitate to reach into the vacuum tubes.

”Wait, watch out—!”

Perhaps we’ve been tricked by the Steam Transport Machine. Perhaps finished reconstructing itself right on time.

Whichever was the case, the machine snatched [{0}]’s wrist…

And blasted them with scalding steam.

… It’s going to be a while before [{0}] recovers.

dataList.title: Sinal de rosas
dataList.behaveDesc: De que cor você gostaria de pintar as pétalas?
successDesc:
"Ah, how pretty."

"And so vivid, too!"

"Your sin was such a beautiful hue of {0}."

"You've really made a fine addition to the garden."

"The color of {0}?! I'll plant it right next to me."

"Then… Shall we play some more?"

"This garden will become terribly beautiful with more sinful flowers we bloom!"
failureDesc:
"Mm, still too pale."

"We don't need bland flowers like yours."

"How disappointing~"

With that, they fell silent.

They probably didn't like it very much.
